00038 #ifndef _osapi_core_
00039 #define _osapi_core_

00041 #include <stdarg.h>   /* for va_list */
00042 
00043 /*difines constants for OS_BinSemCreate for state of semaphore  */
00044 #define OS_SEM_FULL     1
00045 #define OS_SEM_EMPTY    0
00046 
00047 /* #define for enabling floating point operations on a task*/
00048 #define OS_FP_ENABLED 1
00049 
00050 /*  tables for the properties of objects */
00051 
00052 /*tasks */
00053 typedef struct
00054 {
00055     char name [OS_MAX_API_NAME];
00056     uint32 creator;
00057     uint32 stack_size;
00058     uint32 priority;
00059     uint32 OStask_id;
00060 }OS_task_prop_t;
00061     
00062 /* queues */
00063 typedef struct
00064 {
00065     char name [OS_MAX_API_NAME];
00066     uint32 creator;
00067 }OS_queue_prop_t;
00068 
00069 /* Binary Semaphores */
00070 typedef struct
00071 {                     
00072     char name [OS_MAX_API_NAME];
00073     uint32 creator;
00074     int32  value;
00075 }OS_bin_sem_prop_t;
00076 
00077 /* Counting Semaphores */
00078 typedef struct
00079 {                     
00080     char name [OS_MAX_API_NAME];
00081     uint32 creator;
00082     int32 value;
00083 }OS_count_sem_prop_t;
00084 
00085 /* Mutexes */
00086 typedef struct
00087 {
00088     char name [OS_MAX_API_NAME];
00089     uint32 creator;
00090 }OS_mut_sem_prop_t;
00091 
00092 
00093 /* struct for OS_GetLocalTime() */
00094 
00095 typedef struct 
00096 { 
00097     uint32 seconds; 
00098     uint32 microsecs;
00099 }OS_time_t; 
00100 
00101 /* heap info */
00102 typedef struct
00103 {
00104     uint32 free_bytes;
00105     uint32 free_blocks;
00106     uint32 largest_free_block;
00107 }OS_heap_prop_t;
00108 
00109 
00110 /* This typedef is for the OS_GetErrorName function, to ensure
00111  * everyone is making an array of the same length */
00112 
00113 typedef char os_err_name_t[35];

00116 ** These typedefs are for the task entry point
00117 */

00119 typedef osal_task ((*osal_task_entry)(void));
